column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: On the  morning of July 03
column7: Hun Sen led a cabinet meeting to review issues in Cambodia.------During that occasion
column8: Hun Sen allowed the casino to resume business operations. According to reports
column9: casinos will first only operate certain bets and slot machines. Phay Siphan
column10: a government spokesman who attended the meeting
column11: quoted the prime minister as on Facebook. “All such casinos are required to obtain permission from the Ministry of Health
column12: (and) meet certain requirements of preventive measures against COVID-19”.------KBN------Casinos have been ------closed since April 1------ to prevent the spread of the coronavirus. No date has been yet mentioned for the reopening schedule.
